reference.shortdesc: A copyright is a legal device that gives the creator of a creative work the sole right to publish and sell that work.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The copyright element is a grouping element that contains elements that specify the copyright holder and the copyright year.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and the attribute defined below.

dlentry.dd: Indicates the legal status of the copyright holder.
